_comment1: Some enchantment description mods use .desc-style lang keys, others use .description-style, so the duplicates are intentional
enchantment.hold_your_enemies_closer.ant: Hit enemies will be knocked towards you
Hit enemies will be knocked towards you
enchantment.hold_your_enemies_closer.fro: Shot enemies will be take freeze damage as if they were in Powdered Snow
Shot enemies will be take freeze damage as if they were in Powdered Snow
enchantment.hold_your_enemies_closer.ice: Hit enemies will be take freeze damage as if they were in Powdered Snow
Hit enemies will be take freeze damage as if they were in Powdered Snow
enchantment.hold_your_enemies_closer.ant: Hit enemies will be knocked in the opposite direction of the arrow's velocity
Hit enemies will be knocked in the opposite direction of the arrow's velocity
enchantment.hold_your_enemies_closer.swi: Increases the speed at which you move in liquids
Increases the speed at which you move in liquids
_comment2: Swimming Speed attribute is only used on Fabric, NeoForge uses its native swim speed attribute instead
Additional swimming speed from the Swift Swim enchantment
Additional swimming speed from the Swift Swim enchantment
Multiplier on reduction of freezing ticks
Multiplier on reduction of freezing ticks
